thread.section_title: Armstrong Steel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Armstrong Steel | www.armstrongsteelbuildings.com
thread.title: Marie Bonner
thread.title_full: Armstrong Steel reviewed by Marie Bonner

author: Marie Bonner
title: Marie Bonner
text: I knew it was possible to go a cheaper route, but I was interested in a quality metal building that would actually last. I looked around and really did my homework on several building manufacturers, and when Armstrong Steel was recommended to me by another firm, I realized they were the best choice. I’ve had great service throughout the purchase and design process, and everyone was very good at communication and very helpful. Specifically, Elisa in the Accounts department was brilliant. She was incredibly patient with me, and I know it could have been a different situation with another company. I’d be happy to recommend Armstrong Steel to friends and family.
